name: Metapod
description: The shell covering this Pokémon's body is as hard as an iron slab. Metapod does not move very much because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the shell.

name: Butterfree
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air. The scales on its wings are often brightly colored.

name: Weedle
description: Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable of distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes just by sniffing with its big red nose.

name: Kakuna
description: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches. It remains virtually immobile.

name: Beedrill
description: Beedrill is extremely territorial. No one should ever approach its nest—this is for their own safety. If angered, they will attack in a furious swarm.

name: Pidgey
description: Pidgey has an extremely docile nature. It prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.

name: Pidgeotto
description: This Pokémon flies over its territory in search of prey. It defends its sprawling territory fiercely against intruders.

name: Pidgeot
description: This Pokémon has beautiful feathers. Its magnificent wings are often the envy of other bird Pokémon.

name: Rattata
description: Rattata is cautious and quick to act. If you see one, it is certain that 40 more live in the area.

name: Raticate
description: Its rear feet have three toes each. They are webbed, enabling it to swim across rivers.

name: Spearow
description: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.

name: Fearow
description: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

name: Ekans
description: Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. This position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a headbutt or bite.

name: Arbok
description: The pattern on its belly is said to be a frightening face that wards off enemies. It has been admired and feared since ancient times.

name: Pikachu
description: Whenever Pikachu comes across something new, it blasts it with a jolt of electricity. If you come across a blackened berry, it’s evidence that this Pokémon mistook the intensity of its charge.

name: Raichu
description: If the electrical sacs become excessively charged, Raichu plants its tail in the ground and discharges. Scorched patches of ground will be found near this Pokémon’s nest.

name: Sandshrew
description: Sandshrew’s body is configured to absorb water without waste, enabling it to survive in an arid desert. It burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water.

name: Sandslash
description: It curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

name: Nidoran♀
description: Nidoran♀ has barbs that secrete a powerful poison. They are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokémon.

name: Nidorina
description: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs secrete a powerful poison.
